title: New: Sam Smith – Safe With Me
content:
Having lent his vocals to two of the biggest singles of recent years (Latch by Disclosure and La La La by Naughty Boy), 21 year old singer Sam Smith has been busy preparing his own solo material, alongside playing a run of festivals.

Safe With Me is lifted from his debut three track EP, set for release through PMR (Disclosure, Jessie Ware etc.) later this year, and was premiered earlier this evening on MistaJam’s 1xtra Show. As to be expected, it plays to the soulful vocals of Smith, whilst also offering itself up to be ready for indie dancefloors around the country, courtesy of the choppy, almost hip-hop production from Two Inch Punch. Let’s be honest, it’s one of the singles of the year. Also, keep it locked for his debut full length expected next year. Check out Safe With Me below.

don’t you know that you’re safe with me / all your worries can be put to sleep
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
